hello world!: こんにちま！　ザ・ワールド！
Ever stand in a long line? Wish you coul: Ever stand in a long line? Wish you could make a friend towards the head? LineSocial is a point based system where people connect on long lines. Whether line for a concert, Black Friday, the latest iPhone or just at the supermarket, people can meet and stand in line together.
Unlike other social media, LineSocial is: Unlike other social media, LineSocial is contextually driven: your relationship is limited to the context of standing on line at a given time and place. After the line is over, you can go your separate ways without any long term commitment to a relationship. To that end we do not save messages past the point you stand on line with that person.  We will not provide a mechanism to share pictures or any profile information about you. You should see this app as just a way to make standing on line a little easier.
Currently we are in Alpha testing phase. This IS NOT a full featured app. Terms and Conditions are subject to changes such a fee for use. Clearly though, this app will only be useful if people use it and most people will only use it for free. So our business model has yet to decide the happy compromise between free for use and premium service.
Register an account or connect through F: Register an account or connect through Facebook. Press "Lines" to find lines in your area. Agree to use location services so we can find a line at your venue where someone is checked in.
Well, in order for this to work, one per: Well, in order for this to work, one person has to check in to facilitate the interaction. People who check in can be rewarded with points by people who "Line Poke" them. When you actually check in you are given a list of line lengths in time. These are only your estimates on how long the line is to help us determine when to terminate a Check In. If you stray 500 meters away from your Check In for 6 minutes we automatically Check Out your Check In at which point you need to Check In to become available for Line Pokes. Depending on if the app is currently active or accepting push notifications, this feature may not be functional.
Yes, well if you have checked in, someon: Yes, well if you have checked in, someone will want to connect to you through a line poke These pokes are sent by going to "Lines" and then selecting a specific check in from a list.
LineSocial will only track your location: LineSocial will only track your location for duration of your Check In. Check In either expires by time, another Check In or movement 500 meters away from the point of Check In for 6 minutes.  Your account information will include Firstname, Lastname, Username. For users who registered manually by entering username and password we store their encrypted password and email address. For users registered via Social Media sites such as Facebook, no username and password are stored. Instead we store an ID associated with that account.
Can I read my old messages?: Can I read my old messages?
No. Once you finished your line and your: No. Once you finished your line and your checkin expires, you will not have access to previous messages.  This app is intended for the Lines. What happens in the lines stays in the lines.
No, the point of this app is to remain a: No, the point of this app is to remain anonymous until you wish to share your line location. You decide if you want to share your spot in line. You could say this is the antisocial social network!
